Package me.moros.bending.util

Class ParticleUtil

java.lang.Object
me.moros.bending.util.ParticleUtil
public final class ParticleUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class to provide create and render Particle. You should prefer this over using a custom ParticleBuilder to ensure uniform rendering across different abilities.
See Also:
ParticleBuilder

    • displayAsync

      public static void displayAsync​(@NonNull com.destroystokyo.paper.ParticleBuilder pb)
      Asynchronously spawns and sends the given particle effect to its receivers. Make sure you have collected the receivers in a sync thread first.
      Parameters:
      pb - the particle effect builder that holds the particle data to display

    • fromHex

      public static org.bukkit.Color fromHex​(@NonNull java.lang.String hexValue)
      Convert a hex string into a Color.
      Parameters:
      hexValue - the string holding the hex value, needs to be in the format "RRGGBB"
      Returns:
      the color from the provided hex value or Color.BLACK if hex value was invalid
